statements: SELECT * FROM therapist_schedule WHERE therapist_id = 1;
SELECT therapist_id, client_id FROM therapist_schedule WHERE appointment_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM therapist_schedule WHERE appointment_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00' ORDER BY therapist_id DESC;
SELECT therapist_id, appointment_date, appointment_notes FROM therapist_schedule WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, duration_minutes FROM therapist_schedule WHERE therapist_id = 2 AND client_id = 1 ORDER BY appointment_date, appointment_time ASC, duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT therapist_id, client_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, duration_minutes, appointment_notes FROM therapist_schedule WHERE therapist_id = 1 AND appointment_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT therapist_id, client_id, appointment_date, duration_minutes FROM therapist_schedule WHERE appointment_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM therapist_schedule WHERE appointment_date = '2023-02-28' ORDER BY therapist_id DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT therapist_id, COUNT(client_id) AS total_clients FROM therapist_schedule GROUP BY therapist_id HAVING total_clients > 3;
SELECT therapist_id, AVG(duration_minutes) AS average_duration FROM therapist_schedule GROUP BY therapist_id HAVING average_duration > 30;
SELECT therapist_id, therapist_name, therapist_specialization FROM therapists;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_id, therapist_specialization FROM therapists WHERE therapist_specialization = 'Psychologist';
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients;
SELECT client_email, client_name FROM clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT therapist_name FROM therapists WHERE therapist_specialization = 'Counselor';
SELECT therapist_id, therapist_name, therapist_specialization FROM therapists WHERE therapist_specialization = 'Psychologist';
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialization FROM therapists WHERE therapist_specialization = 'Physiotherapist' ORDER BY therapist_name DESC;
SELECT therapist_id, therapist_name, therapist_specialization FROM therapists WHERE therapist_specialization = 'Counselor' LIMIT 3;
SELECT therapist_id, therapist_name FROM therapists;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty FROM therapists ORDER BY therapist_specialty;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_time DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty FROM therapists WHERE therapist_specialty = 'Psychologist';
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;

SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, therapist_name, client_name FROM appointments INNER JOIN therapists ON appointments.therapist_id = therapists.therapist_id INNER JOIN clients ON appointments.client_id = clients.client_id WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT therapist_name, COUNT(appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM therapists LEFT JOIN appointments ON therapists.therapist_id = appointments.therapist_id GROUP BY therapist_name HAVING total_appointments > 0;

SELECT therapist_name, SUM(appointment_duration) AS total_duration FROM therapists JOIN appointments ON therapists.therapist_id = appointments.therapist_id GROUP BY therapist_name ORDER BY total_duration DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty FROM therapists;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty FROM therapists WHERE therapist_specialty = 'Psychology';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE therapist_id = 2 AND client_id = 3;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty FROM therapists
SELECT therapist_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM therapists JOIN appointments ON therapists.therapist_id = appointments.therapist_id
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 3
SELECT therapist_name, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM therapists JOIN therapist_schedule ON therapists.therapist_id = therapist_schedule.therapist_id

SELECT therapist_name, client_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM therapists JOIN appointments ON therapists.therapist_id = appointments.therapist_id JOIN clients ON clients.client_id = appointments.client_id
SELECT * FROM therapists;
SELECT therapist_id, therapist_name FROM therapists WHERE therapist_specialization = 'Psychologist';
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialization FROM therapists JOIN appointments ON therapists.therapist_id = appointments.therapist_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM clients WHERE client_id IN (SELECT client_id FROM client_appointment_history WHERE appointment_status = 'cancelled');
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialization FROM therapists;
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, start_time, end_time FROM appointments WHERE therapist_id = 1 AND appointment_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT client_name, therapist_name, appointment_status FROM clients c JOIN client_appointment_history h ON c.client_id = h.client_id JOIN therapists t ON h.therapist_id = t.therapist_id WHERE h.appointment_status = 'completed';

SELECT therapist_name, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM therapists JOIN therapist_availability ON therapists.therapist_id = therapist_availability.therapist_id WHERE therapist_specialization = 'Counseling' AND day_of_week = 'Monday';
